boardgame.description: By all appearances, it's just two players taking turns laying stones on a 19_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;times;19 (or smaller) grid of intersections. But once its basic rules are understood, Go shows its staggering depth. One can see why many people say it's one of the most elegant brain-burning abstract games in history, with players trying to claim territory by walling off sections of the board and surrounding each other's stones. The game doesn't end until the board fills up, or, more often, when both players agree to end it, at which time whoever controls the most territory wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The earliest mention of Go (圍棋 (w_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;i q_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;)- _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;surrounding game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;) appears in the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Analects_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; of Confucius (551-479 BC), while the earliest physical evidence is a 17_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;times;17 Go board discovered in 1952 in a tomb of the former Han dynasty (206 BC- 9 AD). There is a tangle of conflicting popular and scholarly anecdotes attributing its invention to two Chinese emperors, an imperial vassal and court astrologers. One story has it that Go was invented by the legendary Emperor Yao (ruled 2357-2256 BC) as an amusement for his idiot son. A second claims that the Emperor Shun (ruled 2255-2205 BC) created the game in hopes of improving his weak-minded son's mental prowess. A third says the person named Wu, a vassal of the Emperor Jie (ruled 1818-1766 BC), invented Go (as well as games of cards). Finally, a fourth story suggests that Go was developed by court astrologers during the Zhou dynasty (1045-255 BC)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A Go set, consisting of a very general-purpose grid and colored stones, can also be used to play a variety of other abstract strategy games, such as Connect6, Go-Moku, Pente, and others._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: John Hansen bookcase edition. Box is in good condition. This edition has a standard American _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;boardgame_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; folding board, and cheap plastic _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;stones_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;.
AH version, one clip that holds four piece plastic board together broken. Plastic _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039;stones._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039; Box worn and slightly damaged.

GO 1967 Pacific Game Co. #5005. Complete with 11½_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; square solid wooden game board about ½_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; thick, 182 black stones, 181 white stones, instructions. Gameboard and stones are in Like New condition. Box is worn with broken corners. Shipping weight is 4 pounds.
Bookcase edition: folding board, plastic pieces
Go + Gobang from the Ravensburger Travellers edition. With english rules. Shipping is 6.50$ within U.S., insurance 1.30$ opotional.

Pacific Game Company edition with a box cover that is not on the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Geek (tan and black with a samurai). Hope to take a photo of it prior to sale. Beautiful pieces and board. Box in good shape.

This is a very nice set. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to see my actual copy, I submitted this picture of it: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/image/75224 Folding wood board, brass hinges, wood carrying handle, felt lined trays at the ends hold removable felt lined wood boxes for the stones, and the stones are high quality resin.

This is a real full size board. Full size wood board (15 3/4 inch x 15 3/4 inch) Black and white stone made of glass The front board is for Game Go. The other board is for Janggi(Janggi stones are not included) S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H by Ground shipping Canada post USD $ 12.00 incl insurance for USA USD $ 10.00 incl insurance for Canada For other place let me know your address Paypal only. Thank you !!

Ravensburger edition of Go + GoBang expansion by Alex Randolph (red VP counters are seeded to the board and captured by the players stomes to score escalating amounts of VPs). Complete _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Excellent clean condition. Box is undamaged but has very minor shelfwear on the edges. Reasonable offers will be considered. Shipping Costs: UK £5, Europe £9, USA £12
Beginner Go. This set 11_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; x 11_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; features a full 19x19 board with stones and rules for beginner. New in box, shrink wrapped. Shipping via USPS or UPS Ground.

1976 Pacific Game version. The board is wood and the beads are nice plastic. Box has some aging and a few stray pencil marks on the board (which I did not notice the first time I looked), otherwise this is a perfectly fine set.

Bought but never used Yunzi professional Go stones. Large Size 33 double convex, measure 9.2mm tall and 21mm wide (about 3/8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; x 3/4_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;). Also included are two Kitani style jujube wood Yunzi stone holders that measure 5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; W x 4_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;H (12.7cm x 10cm) and a superb vinyl travel carrying case. All stones have been checked and counted before I decided to sell. This set includes 183 black and 182 white. Most sets come with 181 black and 180 white, so there are some extra in case of accidents. This is a stunning set as you can see.

For sale to newyaker315 ONLY for Cici_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s benefit auction. Thanks for supporting such a great cause! Paul -------- Payment for the winning item can be made in either of three ways. 1. You can send Paypal payment to Cici_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Fund at colofisch@comcast.net (You can get there by clicking on the Donate button on the Fischer family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s blog at http://colofisch.blogspot.com/ 2. You can send Paypal payment to the Rocky Mountain Hyperbaric Association, specifying Cici Fischer account. Link for that is also on the Fischer blog above. This option will allow you to claim a tax deduction for the portion you bid for the item above its fair market value 3. You can mail a money order to Matthew Fisher. Geekmail mfischer for his address.

Get it here for a reasonable deal. $8 to ship anywhere in the USA including HI and AK. Pick up available in Los Angeles/Orange county area. (Torrance or Seal Beach) for free.

1974 Reiss Bookshelf Edition. Mild shelf wear with good condition overall. I charge exact shipping costs, without charging extra for packaging and handling. I will gladly combine shipping on multiple purchases. US buyers get free USPS tracking number. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m open to offers on this.
Full 21x21 board (11.5 x 11.5 inches). Stones have a flat bottom.

Beautiful E.S. Lowe edition with wooden board and nice chiclet pieces. Box shows a bit of wear, but not suprising given its age. For games over $5 each, Buy 3 get $1 off, Buy 4 get 5% off, Buy 6 get 10% off. Shipping is for parcel post w/in US (it is pretty large except in thickness). Insurance is optional; PayPal payments please add 4% to cover PayPal_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s fees.

Game overall is in very good shape. Box is in good condition with minimal shelf wear. Board is wooden and in excellent shape. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s not an extravagent set but it is perfect for someone who wants a nice and functional game of Go.

This is a nice wooden briefcase edition made by Gibson Games. The outside wood has some scratches and marks, and I stuck tape on the rear to stop the rule book slipping out. But inside it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s in excellent condition and looks very good in play. The stones are small and light, but nicely made. A good travel edition. Just not my kind of game. Bought new, played once, put away. With English rules. UK BUYERS - Very cost effective to get two or three games. MyHermes, 0-1kg starts at £2.79, but up to 10kg is from just £6.49. Adding one or two more games is very good value for you. 10kg gets you a lot of games. Happy to receive Paypal in GBP, USD, JPY, EUR. Can provide photos of my copy on request (message me your email). UK - Can ship quickly cheaply by courier. Europe - Can ship quickish by Royal Mail USA / CAN - Royal Mail up to 2kg - various services and prices, ask for info. Over 2kg, ship by Parcelforce. Other locations will research when I get an order. I am looking at other options, but international couriers are expensive in the UK. On Paypal if you make payment as a cash gift to me, I am not charged a fee by Paypal (may differ if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re outside the UK) but you receive no protection in a dispute. If the Paypal payment is a commercial transaction, Paypal charges me near 4% of the payment so you get dispute protection. Of course, you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know me from a hole in the ground. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s your right to protection obviously. But please consider adding a touch to the payment to help cover this fee.
